com.ucsf.core.services

Class FrequentRecurringService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.ucsf.core.services.BackgroundService
        • com.ucsf.core.services.FrequentRecurringService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SensorsService

    public abstract class FrequentRecurringService
extends BackgroundService
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Abstract service called on a regular interval. Between two calls, the application may have been shut down, therefore it's not possible to rely on regular variables. To store values, use instead a PersistentParameter.
